page_content:
![](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/_assets/3137b1a864c689786cac76b3def62dd1/Assets/img/default-banner.jpg)

# Renewing a vehicle registration

Each year, the SAAQ sends a notice for you to renew registration of your vehicle.

## Payment methods

- Through your financial institution: [online⁠ ⁠](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/en/online-services/citizens/renewal-payment/ ""), at an ATM, at the counter or by phone.
- By one or more [pre-authorized debits](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/en/online-services/citizens/payment-pre-authorized-debits). Use our tool to [simulate the number of instalments](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/en/online-services/citizens/simulating-pre-authorized-debits) and estimate their amount.
- By a cheque mailed to the following address:

Société de l'assurance automobile du Québec

Case postale 19100, succursale Terminus

Québec (Québec) G1K 8J6

### Payment deadline and bimonthly pre-authorized debits

Pay by the deadline indicated on the notice.

**Avoid paying these additional fees**

- For late payment (minimum fee, may vary according to the situation): $13.50
- For each NSF cheque: $35.00
- For each rejected pre-authorized debit: $35.00 (if these fees are debited twice for the same payment, contact the SAAQ to receive a reimbursement)

Change: If you had chosen bimonthly pre-authorized debits (6 instalments per year), please note that this option is no longer available. Instalments will instead be withdrawn 12 times per year. Smaller amounts for less hassle!

page_content:
The registration of a passenger vehicle used for your personal needs is renewed at the same time each year. The first letter of your last name determines the month in which your vehicle registration is renewed.

This table scrolls horizontally

| First letter of your last name | Month of renewal |
| --- | --- |
| B | January |
| A - C - W | February |
| D - E - F | May |
| G - H - J | June |
| M - N - O - V | August |
| L | September |
| P - Q - R | October |
| I - K - S - T - U - X - Y - Z | November |

If the passenger vehicle is used by a diplomatic corps or a consular corps, registration is renewed in **March**.

### Motorcycle

Registration of a motorcycle is renewed annually in **April**. Before receiving your payment notice, you can use the [calculation tool](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/en/motorcycle-registration-cost-estimator) to get an estimate of the amount you will have to pay to renew your motorcycle registration.

### Snowmobile and ATV

Registration is renewed annually in:

- **December** for a snowmobile
- **March** for an ATV or off-highway recreational vehicle

### Moped or motorized scooter

Registration of a moped or motorized scooter is renewed annually in **April**.

### Tractor and other farm vehicles

Registration of a farm tractor and other farm vehicles used by a farmer is renewed annually in **April**.

If the tractor belongs to a business or to an individual for personal use, registration is renewed in **March**.

page_content:
If the tractor belongs to a business or to an individual for personal use, registration is renewed in **March**.

There is no annual renewal of registration for a farm trailer.

#### Special rate for farmers

To obtain the special rate on registration, you must have a valid membership card issued by the Union des producteurs agricoles (UPA) or the Ministère de l'Agriculture, des Pêcheries et de l'Alimentation (MAPAQ).

If you send your payment by mail, you do not have to enclose your card.

### Truck weighing over 3,000 kg

Registration of a truck with a net weight of more than 3,000 kg is renewed annually in **March**.

The owner may be an individual or a business.

### Bus and minibus

Registration of a bus or minibus is renewed annually in **March**.

If the vehicle is a **school bus or minibus**, its registration is renewed annually in **September**.

### Trailer

There is no renewal of registration for a trailer.

The owner of a trailer pays to register it only once, either when it is registered the first time or when title is transferred to a new owner.

### Commercial or special-use vehicle

Registration of a vehicle belonging to a business or a special-use vehicle is renewed annually in **March**. This category includes:

- a passenger vehicle
- a vehicle belonging to a driving school
- a vehicle belonging to a school service centre, hospital centre, charity or parish
- a tool vehicle

### Restricted-use vehicle

page_content:
- a passenger vehicle
- a vehicle belonging to a driving school
- a vehicle belonging to a school service centre, hospital centre, charity or parish
- a tool vehicle

### Restricted-use vehicle

Registration of a restricted-use vehicle is renewed annually in **March**.

### Amateur radio operator's vehicle

Registration of a vehicle bearing an amateur (ham) radio operator's licence plate is renewed annually in **March**.

### Dealer plate

Registration of an X licence plate is in **March**.

### Motor home

Registration of a motor home with a net weight of more than 3,000 kg or a motor home belonging to a business is renewed annually in **April**.

### Winter vehicle

Registration of the following vehicles is renewed annually in **December**:

- a winter tool vehicle
- a snowblower

### Change of address and modification of a vehicle

Keep your registration payment notice. You may need it to notify us of a change of address or modifications to the vehicle during the year.

#### If you choose not to renew your registration

If a vehicle is no longer in your possession or is no longer in use, you must inform the SAAQ before the payment due date. You must indicate the reason why you are not renewing your registration on the renewal notice and mail it to us.

Otherwise, you will have to pay registration fees, which will be calculated based on the date you informed us. In addition, late fees may apply.

Last update: February 6, 2025

- ## See also

- ## See also

- [Calculation tool - Motorcycle registration](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/en/motorcycle-registration-cost-estimator)
- ## Publications

- [There are now several easy and convenient ways to pay! (PDF, 1.2 MB)⁠ ⁠](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/blob/saaq/documents/publications/ways-to-pay.pdf)
- ## Costs

- [Cost of registration renewal according to the type of vehicle](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/en/saaq/rates-fines/vehicle-registration/cost-renewal)
- [Fees Related to a Vehicle Registration](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/en/saaq/rates-fines/vehicle-registration/fees)
- ## Online services

- [Online Payment](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/en/online-services/citizens/paying-the-drivers-licence-or-vehicle-registration-renewal-fees)
- [Pre-Authorized Debits](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/en/online-services/citizens/payment-pre-authorized-debits)
- ## Other websites

- [Bureau des infractions et amendes⁠ ⁠](https://www.amendes.qc.ca/RPVVirtuel/Paiement_en_ligne.asp?lang=French)
- ## Laws and regulations

## Safety first, on the road and online

We are committed to protecting your personal information and privacy. That's why, when we collect data, we follow a [Policy on Privacy](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/en/policies/privacy) that is responsible and transparent. By continuing to browse without modifying your preferences, you accept the use of cookies.
